website_summaries.verdict: A two-pack of these bowls helps keep your puppy and your budget healthy.
pros: Works for dry or wet food
Holds a good amount of food
Keeps dogs from eating too quickly and getting sick
cons: The grooves on this bowl may be a little too high for dogs without a long snout

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger dog with small snout not tiny dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but didn’t work for my little chihuahuas - it’s huge and deep as you can see from picture provided next to her regular food bowl that is cat sized - I failed to pay attention to the size - think it’s much better for a medium to large dog with a small snout otherwise it would have worked well - also the box they came in said they were Coral feeders but they were in fact the Snail shape that is pictured
customer_reviews.author: CypressBecka

customer_reviews.title: Hate that they're made in China but....
customer_reviews.text: They do work well, I have Laprador Gobblers who feel like they have to scarf everything at the speed of light, making everyone in the vicinity assume that I haven't fed them in 3 weeks instead just the night before. They are great colors, the melon is a little more pink that I'd like but my four-footed children aren't picky as long as it delivers the kibble. I do make sure to remove them and wash them each time so they don't get chewed up/gross. I really, really, hate using anything made in China for my pets but I didn't have a lot of choice with this particular purchase, so I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: dicentra

customer_reviews.title: Slow Down
customer_reviews.text: My new puppy and eight-year-old Boston Terrier Beagle were both eating their meals way too fast. The puppy eats kibbles with some added water and the older one eats raw. These bowls truly slowed the pup. She went from about 30 seconds to nearly seven minutes. I do need to put these dishes down on a towel or mat for them to remain in place. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Doubled Their Eating Time. I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first, but they really do work. I have two border collie/heeler mixes who used to eat they're food without breathing. Now with these its doubled they're eating time without making them go insane. It took my dogs (smedium sized) couple times for them to get used to it but now it's great and they aren't bothered by it at all. ........Five Stars.........Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended to help dogs slow their eating.
customer_reviews.text: It took a little bit of time for our dogs to get used to the design, but they work really well. The only recommendation that I would have for this product would be to add rubber stopper's to the bottom. When we first got these our dogs would push them all over the room trying to get all of the food out. Overall though, this is a great product and our dogs have slowed down their eating significantly and they haven't thrown up their food since we started using these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean slow-feeder
customer_reviews.text: The grooves are wide enough that I can fit my fingers all the way in with a dish cloth for cleaning. They're also dishwasher safe. It’s lightweight, so a food mat helps to keep it in place. My dog eats about 3/4 cup of dry food per meal and it spreads perfectly in this dish. More would fit. This dish slows her down to 1:30, when she would eat the same amount from a regular bowl in 20 - 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: My Doberman would constantly scarf down food! Leaving her belly swollen and very gassy. This is helped out so much and I can still get three one couple scoops inside the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Dobermans
customer_reviews.text: My two Dobermans eat extremely fast.. One usually takes about 40 seconds to eat and the other about 1 minute. With these bowls, I fill them up and feed twice a day (2 cups per meal) and it takes both of them about 4 minutes or more to finish their meal. I'm thankful for whoever invented these bowls
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: So many positive benefits
customer_reviews.text: SO happy I found this bowl! My rat terrier used to gulp his food down in seconds. Since using this bowl, he’s gone from 32 lbs to 20 lbs, which is how much he SHOULD weigh. It’s forced him to slow waaaay down, and I think he actually enjoys the challenge of the maze :)
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Puppy sized
customer_reviews.text: These are great to get puppies to eat slower! I liked them better with home modifications. I had to put hot glue on the bottom edges to keep them from being scooted all over the room. These are puppy food sized bowls, in a few months I will know if they will hold a proper amount of dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Huff

customer_reviews.title: Love these for slowing down feeding
customer_reviews.text: I love that this came in a two pack. It significantly slows down my dogs feeding time and makes her work a lot harder for her food! Our trainer recommended these and I’ve been happy since using them. I just throw them in the dishwasher to clean or if it’s not full yet, I rinse with soap and hot water and a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this bowl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bowls to slow our puppy down from eating to fast. They caused her to walk around the dish in a circle. We were getting dizzy watching her eat like this. Since I threw the boxes out and I figured I couldn’t return them without the box I decided to purchased 2 different brand bowls that had raised areas in it. The Jargood bowl worked much better with the raised areas and she is not walking around in a circle when she eats.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for Labs or other strong chewers.
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great while they lasted but with two lab puppies, they went in the trash from the chewing that went along with the challenge of getting the food out. For the money though, they did the job and slowed down a very fast eater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It slowed him way down. He went from bolting his food like a teen boy to eating slowly, not that he has a choice. I'm fine with that. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: RollinggirlTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: No more unnecessary tummy gurgles
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer it was a little heavier, so not so movable. Doggie could easily turn over as well. Love that she didn't finish dinner before I put scoop away. No more unnecessary tummy gurgles. Great to keep her on her paws as well. One for home one for travels
customer_reviews.author: Christy Marble

customer_reviews.title: From 20 seconds to four minutes
customer_reviews.text: It works. Not as well as I was hoping but it definitely went from a twenty second meal to a four minute meal
customer_reviews.author: I Am Awesome

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to watch the dog figue ways to get to her food. Slows her eating way down while working on her cognitive development.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Girls Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these bowls. I was worried they would be a bit too small, or hard for them to eat out of, but they are great! They love the challenge and the best part is that they now have matching bowls so they have nothing to get jealous about! Would definitely recommend! The size is just fine for our medium to large size dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Vaca

customer_reviews.title: Not for flat faced breeds
customer_reviews.text: Moves all over the floor while dog is trying to eat. Grooves are too deep for flat faced dogs like frenchies. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Lay

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs who eat too fast
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls for my boys because it slows them down so they are coking on their food and so my little guy has time to eat before the scarf up their entire bowl. Easy to clean and good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! We have a wiener dog and chihuahua that absolutely gobbled within seconds. These bowls are perfect. It’s hard for them and they have to work. It’s slowed them both down to minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slow feeders
customer_reviews.text: These are great slow feeders however the only thing that would make them better is if they had silicone on the bottom. They are completely hard plastic so there is no grip and they move around while your dog eats.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and helped our puppy go from scarffung good down in 30 seconds to taking a few minutes to eat. She wasn't happy at first but now she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Slow eaters
customer_reviews.text: Works great for ours! Cute too they spin in circles to try to figure the puzzle out. Ultimately it works
customer_reviews.author: Nicole viar

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Puppies
customer_reviews.text: If you have a puppy who likes to chew on things, don’t turn your back on them while they’re eating out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs wolf down their food but these bowls made it impossible for them to eat. The grooves are too narrow for even the puppy with a long, thin muzzle to get the food. The bowls slide all over the floor making it even harder.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carol Clark, author Addict America: The Lost Connection

customer_reviews.title: Not good for big medium/Large dogs
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute but to small for my lab mix/ boxer mix and bull terrier mix ( who run small in size ). They had trouble eating out of it. plastic was very thin and breaks easy not good for chewers I am guessing and not great for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: Stop your dog from choking :)
customer_reviews.text: They are a little bit bigger than I had anticipated but I have two little dogs (5lb and 8lb) and it works for them. They both used to scarf down their food and then choke for the next several minutes... problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Where the Wild Ones Are

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have a 4 month old pup at home and she was eating ridiculously fast out of her normal bowl. With these it takes 2 to 3 times longer for her to eat, which gives me time to prep my dinner. My trainer also mentioned that these are great for brain training. Bought them about two months ago and still sturdy and working great.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Good item does the job
customer_reviews.text: These have definitely slowed my puppy's eating down a lot. Shes figured out how to work it but still has to eat slower than before. Made well but I have to put it on a rug or it slides all over the floor
customer_reviews.author: B jones

customer_reviews.title: No more rush!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the dogs who rushes eating. Slows them down while still making the food available. Mine seem to have fun eating from them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bottom grip
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize they didn’t have any kind of grip on the bottom. The dogs can’t eat out of them because they move everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnee

customer_reviews.title: Great for fast eaters!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bowl that would slow down my dogs eating habit. This bowl is great! First time she ate out of it slowed her feeding down tremendously. No bloating or indigestion! Well made and easy to clean. The fact that I got two was bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The product has held up for months now with no wear and tear! I have 2 big dogs and I honestly thought the bowls would be torn to shreds by now.... the only downfall is my dogs figured out the pattern within the second meal and now walk in circles as they eat. *kinda cute* *brought some good laughs to the house* BUT overall it still slowed them down!!
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Super nice slow feeder that is like brain work!
customer_reviews.text: I have two Malinois and they eat from these daily, and I ordered the snail bowls as they like the change, as it keeps them slowing down meals.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My dog couldn't reach the food
customer_reviews.text: My current solution is to spread my dog's food out on the floor and that's still the case bc he couldn't reach the food in the bowl with his nose/tongue. He's a 14lb toy poodle for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Spiehler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cats who over eat
customer_reviews.text: Helped my cats slow down their eating and has stopped them from vomiting their food up from over eating. Slides around the floor from them pushing it. Wish there was slip proofing on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for some, not for all.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for dogs with snouts! My corgi mix and terrier have fun with it, however my shih tsu can't really get down in it for the food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bowl for fast eaters
customer_reviews.text: These are great for dogs who like to Wolf down their food. They prevent them from eating super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: To large for cats but seems that the ridges would be to close together and deep for dogs to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Freya Mae

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy eats so fast so I bought these to help slow her down. These are by far the best ones I’ve bought. Definitely will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: These are big
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are very large! I was looking for a puzzle bowl for my cat and these are definitely for a dog or large puppy. The return policy is terrible as it will cost me almost the purchase price to return. I will likely donate to a shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Farley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it?
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t feel like good material but works for small dogs maybe, I have German Shepard, not a good product for him but worth the price
customer_reviews.author: theking

customer_reviews.title: The slow feeders really work!
customer_reviews.text: Both my rescue dogs ate too fast and they slow feeder bowls are perfect. They are also lightweight and easy to clean. I would recommend them to anyone who wants their pet to slow down and not inhale their food.
customer_reviews.author: Char Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs eat wayyyy too fast. Got these, and it definitely slowed them down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Perez

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality and very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a very small dog, there is not enough space for your pet to be able to access the food. I returned these as I could see they were not going to work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: LISA S

customer_reviews.title: Makes mealtime last.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two medium size dogs. They used to gobble up their food in 30 seconds. Now it takes them a few minutes to finish their meals.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too deep for small breeds.
customer_reviews.text: The grooves are super deep, not suitable for small breeds. I have a mini schnauzer who can barely reach the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kara L Barton

customer_reviews.title: It depends....
customer_reviews.text: It works very well as far as slowing down their eating which is the whole point of the bowl. However it's not very durable if you have a dog who likes to chew.
customer_reviews.author: James Brafford

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them amused
customer_reviews.text: I think our dogs hate these, but it’s because they get the job done. No more gulping down their dinner in one bite. Also great for keeping them amused in their crates with a small portion of food.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Not for smaller dogs, she broke it in the second feeding because she was hitting and flipping it to try to get food out. Her tongue was not long enough to get down in the channels
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Slow feeder.
customer_reviews.text: There ok but to light. My dog tips ot over.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Craun

customer_reviews.title: really slows my pups down
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 german shepherds and the boy would basically inhale his food before, now that i have these bowls it slows the eating process down and they even seem to have fun trying to get the food out of the grooves
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! 2 for 1!
customer_reviews.text: Good bowls for the purchase basically 2 for the price of one of the fancy bowls that’s basically the same product! Great Deal! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Britny Roach

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: They barely can hold two cups. Definitely on the small side for my German Shepherds.
customer_reviews.author: Allie M.

customer_reviews.title: It was cracked!
customer_reviews.text: These food bowls were my huskies to make them work for their food but I noticed that the green one was cracked in the center. Terrible product! This could of harmed my dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: but they do fine. Fill them over your food bin and give ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick for my 2 pibbles that eat so fast they tend to choke. I was worried about capacity at first, but they do fine. Fill them over your food bin and give them a bit of a jiggle and a swirl to settle it.
customer_reviews.author: Migat

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is made with very durable material. My dog is a really tough chewer and will tear everything she gets her mouth on. This has also taken feeding time from one minute to a total of 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It did its job....the puppy slowed down eating...no more belching!
customer_reviews.author: reeree

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to happen to my dog
customer_reviews.text: They slide around so I wish they had grips on the bottom but this has been the best thing for my dog. She used to eat so fast she would vomit and now she doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn’t mind at all
customer_reviews.text: Very effective in slowing down feeding!! My dog doesn’t mind at all
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs destroyed it after only one week. I have a puppy and a 10 year old dog and both of them broke it. Pretty decepointed of this
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: For a really small dog
customer_reviews.text: A nightmare to clean. Doesn’t hold much food or water. The dogs seem to like them tho.
customer_reviews.author: D & J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work but need something on the bottom to stop sliding
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: great way to keep puppy amused
customer_reviews.text: i use this to feed an energetic super hungry puppy.It slows his eating and also keeps him quite busy..
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! My 2 dogs both had the habit of inhaling their food and these bowls definitely helped!
customer_reviews.author: KMor

customer_reviews.title: Use them all the time. Sometimes both at the same time if I want to be mean
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my cat. Hes figured out how to get his food out with his paw but it takes him 4-5x as long to eat
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 6 month lab pup. Keeps him from eating too fast
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G

customer_reviews.title: Flip over easy
customer_reviews.text: My labs could flip these bowls over relatively easy and get to all the food. Went with something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grooves are a bit too tall for a dog with a small mouth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have two Pomeranians and their snouts were too small to be able to use these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Loving

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! They really help them eat slower!
customer_reviews.author: C Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had stoppers. The girls slide them from one end of the room to the next while eating
customer_reviews.author: LA-LA

product_meta.title: Juvale 2-Pack Interactive Spiral Dog Bowl, Slow Feeder Pet Dish to Stop Bloat, Pink and Green
product_meta.description: Slow Feed Dog Bowl Set comes in two, one in pink and one in green. Each features a snail shape maze design for slowing down the food consumption speed for preventing regurgitation and reducing the likelihood of cardiovascular disease and flatulence. It is designed for puppies to maneuver around the food and have fun while eating. It works as a game and a feeding tool!
feature_bullets: FUN FEEDER BOWLS: Includes 2 snails shape pattern dishes, one in pink and one in green. Every meal will turn into a healthy and happy game! (Suitable for dogs only)
MATERIAL: Made of plastic. Great for dry kibble, wet dog food, and treats. Simply hand wash or put them in your dishwasher for easy cleaning. Not microwave safe.
MAIN EFFECTS: Significantly reduce the speed of eating, prevent choking, overeating, and obesity. Help promote intellectual development and pique your fur baby's interest.
PLAY WITH YOUR FOOD: Swirl design imitates wild dogs foraging pattern in natural environment. Awesome game that assists in portion control and improve digestion.
DIMENSIONS: Each bowl measures 8 inches or 20.5 cm in diameter. Ideal size for medium and large pet animals.
